name: Christmas Panic (itch)
description:
Santa's workshop is working a bit too hard this year!  Scramble to find room in Santa's warehouse for the deluge of presents that are piling up. You get more brownie points the more presents you cram into the building!

Arrow Keys/WASD to Move
Space to Carry a Present or Place it Down
Q and E to rotate a Present if you're Carrying one

Contributors:
Michael Grand (@ifthensoftware on Twitter)
Puprika (puprika on itch.io)
Ezrainc (@ezraentenmann on Twitter)
